oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Inline OpenURL over HTTP
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: NISO Committee AX, OpenURL Standard Committee
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Section 22 of the OpenURL Framework For Context-Sensitive Services Standard (http://www.openurl.info/registry/docs/pdf/z39_88_2004.pdf)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Transport of an Inline ContextObject using the HTTP network protocol.
